snippet: As a professor at the College of the Holy Cross in Worcester, Mass., Father Brooks set out on a mission that led to the integration of what had been an all-male and virtually all-white institution.
abstract: Rev John E Brooks, longest-serving president of the College of the Holy Cross, dies at age 88.
lead_paragraph: As a professor at the College of the Holy Cross in Worcester, Mass., Father Brooks set out on a mission that led to the integration of what had been an all-male and virtually all-white institution.

headline.seo: Rev. John E. Brooks, Barrier-Breaking Holy Cross President, Dies at 88
headline.main: The Rev. John E. Brooks Dies at 88; Widened Paths to Holy Cross
headline.print_headline: The Rev. John E. Brooks, 88; Widened Paths to a College
